title: Ukraine envoy is optimistic Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida will visit Kyiv before May
description: Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida will likely visit Ukraine's capital before the G7 Hiroshima Summit in May, Ukraine's ambassador to Japan Sergiy Korsunsky told CNBC.

title: Zoom shares jump on better-than-expected fourth-quarter results
description: While Zoom's earnings guidance was better than expected, the company continues to see a dramatic slowdown in growth from the Covid boom.

title: Mark Zuckerberg announces new team at Meta working on A.I. products for Instagram, WhatsApp
description: Meta will create a new product group inside the company focused on generative AI, CEO Mark Zuckerberg said.

title: After splitting with Kanye West, British audio startup Kano asks for funding
description: Kano, which sells hardware targeted at musicians and creatives, is launching a new equity investment round that's open to the public.

title: 'Bond ladders are cool again,' says advisor. Here's how to capture higher Treasury bill yields
description: If you're eager to capture higher yields amid rising interest rates, you may consider a Treasury bill, or T-bill, ladder, experts say. Here's what to know.

title: Why 94-year-old ‘Everything Everywhere All at Once’ star James Hong says he's not close to retiring
description: James Hong's career spans roughly 70 years and nearly 700 credits, including playing the grandfather in "Everything Everywhere All At Once."

title: 64% of women say they could do their boss's job better than them, but they aren't getting the chance
description: A severe promotions gap is driving women to quit.

title: Why Goldman's consumer ambitions failed, and what it means for CEO David Solomon
description: As Goldman's Marcus morphed from a side project to a focus for investors, the business expanded and ultimately buckled under the weight of Solomon's ambitions.

title: Fisker confirms Ocean EV deliveries will begin in spring, it's on track to build more than 40,000 in 2023
description: Fisker had "approximately 65,000" reservations for the Ocean SUV, up slightly from "over 62,000" as of its prior earnings report.

title: UK and EU agree to crucial Northern Ireland trade deal in Brexit breakthrough
description: The U.K. and European Union on Monday reached a deal over post-Brexit trading arrangements in Nothern Ireland.

title: Huawei spin-off Honor launches $1,690 foldable smartphone in challenge to Samsung, Apple
description: The Honor Magic Vs marks the Chinese firm's ambition to expand into the latest smartphone technology — foldables — at the high-end of the market.

title: Chinese tech giant Xiaomi debuts prototype augmented reality glasses joining Microsoft and Google
description: If Xiaomi officially launches the product, it will join the likes of Microsoft's HoloLens and the Google Glass Enterprise as AR products on the market.

title: Telecom giant Ericsson says Europe’s industry structure is ‘probably unsustainable’
description: Swedish telecom company Ericsson warned Europe's industry structure is likely unsustainable, calling for consolidation across the region.

title: BMW launches demonstration fleet of hydrogen cars that use fuel cells from Toyota
description: BMW is one of several automotive firms looking into the potential of hydrogen.

title: A South Korean telecoms giant wants to launch flying taxis in 2025 and expects it to be big business
description: Last year, SK Telecom and U.S. firm Joby Aviation inked a tie-up to develop air taxis for the South Korean market.

title: Britain and EU close in on crucial Brexit deal for Northern Ireland
description: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen will meet on Monday for final talks on a deal.

title: France says sanctions against Russia are 'very efficient' as more are being considered
description: France's finance minister told CNBC additional sanctions are being considered against Russia for its unjustified war against Ukraine.

title: EVs are billed as the future. But a potential skills gap is sparking concerns about cost and safety
description: Several big economies are gearing up for a big change: the mass rollout of EVs. But a workforce with the knowledge to properly maintain them will be needed.

title: The small European nation of Switzerland beat sky-high inflation. Here's how
description: Inflation in Switzerland hit a 29-year high of 3.5% in 2022, well below the double-digit rates of other advanced economies.

title: There are still opportunities in VC firms despite a drop in funding, says 500 Global
description: One global firm maintains a positive outlook, as venture funding took a hit in 2022 amid economic uncertainties and a higher cost of capital.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Inflation in January was hotter than expected. Markets felt the heat
description: Markets fell as the personal consumption expenditures price index, the Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation measure, rose more than expected in January.

title: Elon Musk calls US media and schools 'racist against whites & Asians'
description: Musk posted his comments on Twitter in response to media organizations cutting the comic strip "Dilbert" after its creator, Scott Adams. made racist remarks.

title: All investors need a worldview. Here's mine and how to think about developing your own
description: You cannot pick any stock without having a six to nine month outlook about what you think may happen.

title: China Renaissance says its missing founder Bao Fan is cooperating with a government probe
description: Missing Chinese investment banker Bao Fan is cooperating with a government investigation, his firm China Renaissance said in a filing Sunday.
